A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: TLJ was a great movie and it hads its flaws. it is  a straight up love letter to the old cannon and legends. however i found when i went with friends who do not know as much about SW as me they got lost. Especially in scenes where it took knowledge for granted and you were made except it. Even with my knowledge it still suprised me! i love this movie and it is a wonder full creation.
